report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters for BeeWalk
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional spnf ON spnf.id=s.id LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional sc ON sc.parent_sample_id=s.id LEFT JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=sc.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=sc.id OR o.sample_id=s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id left join location_attribute_values lavlu1 on lavlu1.location_id=sc.location_id and lavlu1.location_attribute_id=82 and lavlu1.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tlu1 on tlu1.id=lavlu1.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavlu2 on lavlu2.location_id=sc.location_id and lavlu2.location_attribute_id=83 and lavlu2.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tlu2 on tlu2.id=lavlu2.int_value left join location_attribute_values lvvc on lvvc.location_id=s.location_id and lvvc.location_attribute_id=377 and lvvc.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tvc on tvc.id=lvvc.int_value #joins# WHERE s.survey_id=178 AND #sharing_filter# #filters# #idlist#

column.name: established
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=s.location_id AND location_attribute_id=40 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

column.name: transect_length
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=s.location_id AND location_attribute_id=39 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

column.name: section_length
column.sql: (SELECT int_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=49 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

column.name: h1
column.sql: (SELECT term FROM location_attribute_values lvh1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth1 ON cth1.id=lvh1.int_value WHERE lvh1.location_id=s.location_id AND lvh1.location_attribute_id=44 AND lvh1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h2
column.sql: (SELECT term FROM location_attribute_values lvh1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth1 ON cth1.id=lvh1.int_value WHERE lvh1.location_id=s.location_id AND lvh1.location_attribute_id=45 AND lvh1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h3
column.sql: (SELECT term FROM location_attribute_values lvh1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth1 ON cth1.id=lvh1.int_value WHERE lvh1.location_id=s.location_id AND lvh1.location_attribute_id=46 AND lvh1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: h4
column.sql: (SELECT term FROM location_attribute_values lvh1 JOIN cache_termlists_terms cth1 ON cth1.id=lvh1.int_value WHERE lvh1.location_id=s.location_id AND lvh1.location_attribute_id=47 AND lvh1.deleted=false ORDER BY lvh1.id DESC LIMIT 1 )

column.name: habitat_description
column.sql: (SELECT text_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=48 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

column.name: land_use_description
column.sql: (SELECT text_value FROM location_attribute_values WHERE location_id=sc.location_id AND location_attribute_id=84 AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
